title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
tosdr.tldr: The privacy police is not updated, in the updated privacy policy(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en), there's a new point(What about other tracking technologies, like web beacons?) and it states that: We may use other, similar technologies from time to time, like web beacons (sometimes called “tracking pixels” or “clear gifs”).
